humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there are 27 lymph nodes examined in the right axillary node dissection and metastatic focal breast carcinoma is identified in all 27 nodes (27/27/20). This indicates that the cancer has spread to at least 4 axillary lymph nodes, which corresponds to N3 stage according to the AJCC staging system.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that a right axillary node dissection was performed and that metastatic focal breast carcinoma was found in all 27 lymph nodes examined (27/27/20). This indicates that the cancer has spread to the lymph nodes and the N stage is N2. The presence of extranodal carcinoma and extension into the perinodal fat also supports this staging.
